title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same features as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for chatting, pulling, and benchmarking models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent model cache.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with support for chat, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat inside Django projects.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing an OpenAI-compatible HTTP interface backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Utility library to batch-generate embeddings with Ollama and store in Qdrant/PGVector.

title: ollama-benchmark
summary: Community benchmark suite measuring tokens/sec, latency, and GPU RAM across models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into channels with thread support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template for quick internal Ollama dashboards.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in RAG pipelines.
